org.openimaj.vis

Interface VisualisationImageProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AnimatedVisualisationProvider, TimelineObject, Visualisation<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioOverviewVisualisation, AudioSpectrogram, AudioWaveform, BarVisualisation, BarVisualisation3D, BarVisualisationBasic, ChronologicalScrollingBarVisualisation3D, DiversityAxis, DotPlotVisualisation, DotPlotVisualisation3D, HeatMap, HeightMap3D, LabelledPointVisualisation, Rectangle3DPlotter, ShotBoundaryVideoBarVisualisation, Timeline, TimelineObjectAdapter, VideoBarVisualisation, VideoObjectVisualisation, Visualisation3D, VisualisationImpl, WorldMap, XYPlotVisualisation, XYZVisualisation3D

    public interface VisualisationImageProvider
    An interface for objects that can provide a static image of a visualisation through the getVisualisationImage(). If you need to force a redraw (or an initial draw) of the visualisation, you may call updateVis().
    Version:
    $Author$, $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Set the required size of the visualisation image.
